name: polygonscan-api
description: API to polygonscan with a simple interface

scripts.bundle: browserify index.js -s polygonscanApi -o dist/bundle.js && git commit ./dist -m bundle && git push
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run changelog
scripts.changelog: rm ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && changelog https://github.com/sebs/polygonscan-api all > ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && git add ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && git commit ./docs/CHANGELOG.md -m changelog
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run docs

author: Biswabijaya
